alert.note: Alert for East Carroll; Madison; Richland; West Carroll (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 5:11PM CDT until July 13 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN EAST CARROLL...NORTHWESTERN MADISON...EAST CENTRAL RICHLAND AND SOUTH CENTRAL WEST CARROLL PARISHES... At 511 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Monticello, or 13 miles west of Transylvania, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Monticello around 520 PM CDT. Warden around 530 PM CDT. Waverly around 545 PM CDT. Delhi and Tendal around 550 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Epps. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: East Carroll; Madison; Richland; West Carroll
